channel.title: Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Building Fast Serverless APIs With Minimal APIs on AWS Lambda
item.description: Learn how to deploy ASP.NET Core Minimal APIs to AWS Lambda with just one library and a single line of code. We'll explore the setup process, measure real-world performance including cold start times, and discuss when serverless makes sense for your APIs. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/building-fast-serverless-apis-with-minimal-apis-on-aws-lambda

item.title: Using Stored Procedures and Functions With EF Core and PostgreSQL
item.description: Learn how to use PostgreSQL stored procedures and functions with EF Core to handle complex queries, atomic operations with locking, and database-specific features while keeping the type safety and convenience of EF Core. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/using-stored-procedures-and-functions-with-ef-core-and-postgresql
